«collective»
 
«collective» is a web-based platform providing a collaborative space to work together with colleagues and project partners. Workspaces can be structured hierarchically (institute/organization, departments, groups, teams, …). «collective» includes calendar and document sections (e.g. to make a wiki) as well as areas to upload and structure files/data. The task list tool facilitates forum-type discussions and basic project management.
 
«collective» is a customized version of the open source software Open Atrium.
